page.title: 06WORKING IN & AROUND BEMPTON
page.content: Many of the adult members of the community have to travel out of the village to find {employment.} Some people do find work within Bempton and Buckton perhaps at the school, the local shop/post office,the White Horse Inn or the{railway}station. A growing number of people are becoming {self-employed}running such businesses as plumbing, hairdressing, plant hire, market gardening, garage, joinery, building and antiques. The largest group of self employed in the area is of course{farmers.
